tool_description: An easy RESTful API for manipulating images and applying customizable filters in real-time. You can use the built-in filters or create your own ones on top of our filters. And not only filters: includes resize, rotate and crop functions among the others. No monthly price. Easy as $0.01 per filter. Maximum file size is 4MB.
name: Instafilter.io
title: Instafilter.io

api_list.name: Oil

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: Must be between "1" and "10". Default is "1".

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Edge Detection
api_list.description: Edge detection with a dark background.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Invert
api_list.description: Inverts all the pixels of the image

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Levels
api_list.description: Adjusts the image levels by moving and stretching the brightness of the image histogram.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: lowLevel
optional_parameters.description: Must be a positive decimal number between "0" and "10", like "4.3". By default is "0.0".

optional_parameters.name: lowOutputLevel
optional_parameters.description: Must be a positive decimal number between "0" and "10", like "4.3". By default is "0.0".

optional_parameters.name: highLevel
optional_parameters.description: Must be a positive decimal number between "0" and "10", like "4.3". By default is "0.0".

optional_parameters.name: highOutputLevel
optional_parameters.description: Must be a positive decimal number between "0" and "10", like "4.3". By default is "0.0".

api_list.name: Rotate
api_list.description: Rotates the image (by 90, 180, 270 degrees) or flips it horizontally or vertically.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Resize
api_list.description: Shrinks an image while maintaining its aspect ratio.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Crop
api_list.description: Crops an image in a rectangle, by specifying its size and coordinates.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Custom HSB
api_list.description: Specify custom hue, saturation and brightness.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: hue
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "-1.0" and "1.0".

optional_parameters.name: saturation
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "-1.0" and "1.0".

optional_parameters.name: brightness
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "-1.0" and "1.0".

api_list.name: RGB Mixer
api_list.description: Mixes RGB channels. For each channel, you can specify how much of the other two channels to mix in.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: blueGreen
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

optional_parameters.name: intoRed
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

optional_parameters.name: redBlue
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

optional_parameters.name: intoGreen
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

optional_parameters.name: greenRed
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

optional_parameters.name: intoBlue
optional_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "255".

api_list.name: Colored Edge Detection
api_list.description: Similar to the Edge Detection filter, except with more color.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Black & White
api_list.description: Converts the image colors to shades of grey

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Padding
api_list.description: Adds padding around the image. You can specify both the size and the color.

required_parameters.name: padding
required_parameters.description: The size of padding in pixels.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The HEX code for the color.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Mosaic
api_list.description: Creates a mosaic effect. You can specify the block's size.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: The size of the blocks. Must be higher than zero.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Noise
api_list.description: Adds random noise to the image. You can specify the amount and density.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

required_parameters.name: density
required_parameters.description: Must be between 0 and 1. Supports decimal numbers like "0.4".

required_parameters.name: distribution
required_parameters.description: It can be "uniform" or "gaussian". By default is "uniform".

required_parameters.name: monochrome
required_parameters.description: "true" or "false". Makes the points monochrome or not.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Contrast
api_list.description: Changes the gain and bias of the colors in the image.

required_parameters.name: gain
required_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "100". Default is "0".

required_parameters.name: bias
required_parameters.description: Must be between "0" and "100". Default is "0".

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".

api_list.name: Gamma
api_list.description: Adjusts the gamma, used for changing the brightness of an image

required_parameters.name: gamma
required_parameters.description: The gamma amount. Minimum value is zero.

optional_parameters.name: image
optional_parameters.description: The image to upload. Please value one between "image" and "url".

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The URL to the image. Please value one between "image" and "url".
